invocations.description: Plays the sound with file name filename. All the sound files must be in the bot's '/sounds' directory.
invocations.ex:
auto(200)
if paround(7) > 0 then
	playsound('playeronscreen.wav')
	flashclient()
end
invocations.exDescription: Will play the sound 'playeronscreen.wav' and flash the client if there's a player on your screen.
